mapper.select: SELECT c.id AS competency_id, c.name AS competency_name, c.description AS competency_description, s.id AS skill_id, s.name AS skill_name, s.description AS skill_description, cds.expected AS expectedLevel, cds.selected AS selected, ROUND(AVG(useval.score)) AS averageLevel FROM competencies c JOIN competencies_skills cs ON cs.competency_id = c.id JOIN skills s ON s.id = cs.skill_id LEFT JOIN competencies_disciplines_skills cds ON cds.skill_id = s.id AND cds.competency_id = c.id AND cds.discipline_id = #{disciplineId} LEFT JOIN user_skill_evaluation useval ON useval.skill_id = s.id AND useval.competency_id = c.id AND useval.user_id IN ( SELECT user_id FROM discipline_leaders WHERE cds.discipline_id = #{disciplineId} ) WHERE c.id = #{competencyId} GROUP BY c.id, c.name, c.description, s.id, s.name, s.description, cds.expected, cds.selected
mapper.sql:
SELECT d.id FROM disciplines d WHERE (d.id IN (
SELECT DISTINCT discipline_id FROM discipline_leaders WHERE user_id = #{id, typeHandler = com.iberdrola.cappfdmd.common.handler.UserIdTypeHandler}::numeric ) AND ${@com.iberdrola.core.profiles.constants.ProfileConstants@LIDER_DISCIPLINA} = #{id, typeHandler = com.iberdrola.cappfdmd.common.handler.UserProfileIdTypeHandler}::numeric) OR (d.id IN (
SELECT DISTINCT discipline_id FROM competency_center_disciplines WHERE user_id = #{id, typeHandler = com.iberdrola.cappfdmd.common.handler.UserIdTypeHandler}::numeric ) AND ${@com.iberdrola.core.profiles.constants.ProfileConstants@GRUPO_APOYO} = #{id, typeHandler = com.iberdrola.cappfdmd.common.handler.UserProfileIdTypeHandler}::numeric)
OR (${@com.iberdrola.core.profiles.constants.ProfileConstants@RESPONSABLE_ORGANIZACION} = #{id, typeHandler = com.iberdrola.cappfdmd.common.handler.UserProfileIdTypeHandler}::numeric)
OR (${@com.iberdrola.core.profiles.constants.ProfileConstants@ADMINISTRADOR} = #{id, typeHandler = com.iberdrola.cappfdmd.common.handler.UserProfileIdTypeHandler}::numeric)
